titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that the penalty on the reimportation of tobacco products exported from the United States shall not apply in certain cases.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 3/14/2000--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Service to exempt from penalty certain tobacco products reimported into the United States tax and duty free.
